title.native: カワイスギクライシス

description:
Invading alien Liza Luna wants nothing more than to destroy planet Earth... after she gets in a little sightseeing, first. But her travels soon take her into a cat café, where the furry felines inside invade her heart just as surely as Liza invaded Earth! Destroying the world won’t be so easy now that she’s discovered the joys of kitty cats...

(Source: HIDIVE)

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

node.description:
[Website](https://dialogue-music.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DIALOGUE_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/dialogue_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/DIALOGUEOfficialChannel) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@dialogue_official)

DIALOGUE+ is a voice actress unit composed of the following members:

- [Yurina Uchiyama](https://anilist.co/staff/204404/Yurina-Uchiyama)
- [Nene Hieda](https://anilist.co/staff/163903/Nene-Hieda)
- [Kyouka Moriya](https://anilist.co/staff/164774/Kyouka-Moriya)
- [Yuuna Ogata](https://anilist.co/staff/190470/Yuuna-Ogata)
- [Ayaka Takamura](https://anilist.co/staff/204409/Ayaka-Takamura)
- [Satsuki Miyahara](https://anilist.co/staff/204411/Satsuki-Miyahara)
- [Mayu Iizuka](https://anilist.co/staff/166401/Mayu-Iizuka)
- [Manatsu Murakami](https://anilist.co/staff/204420/Manatsu-Murakami)

__[Website](https://chogakusei.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tyougakusei) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/ChogakuseiOfficial) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/chogakusei/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@chogakusei)__

Chogakusei is a Japanese singer/utaite. He has been active on NicoNico since late 2011 and started uploading covers at age of 11.
